patthana16.2:1.1_0: Kusalaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.2:1.1_1: Kusalaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.2:1.1_2: Kusalaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasahetuko ca naakusalo nasahetuko ca
patthana16.2:2.1_0: Akusalaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.2:2.1_1: Akusalaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.2:2.1_2: Akusalaṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasahetuko ca naakusalo nasahetuko ca
patthana16.2:3.1_0: Abyākataṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.2:3.1_1: Abyākataṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nasahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.2:3.1_2: Abyākataṁ sahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nasahetuko ca naakusalo nasahetuko ca
patthana16.2:4.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… sahajāte ekādasa, aññamaññe cha …pe… kamme ekādasa, vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate ekādasa. (Sahajātavārampi …pe… sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṁ.)
patthana16.2:5.1_0: Kusalo sahetuko dhammo nakusalassa nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.2:5.1_1: Kusalo sahetuko dhammo naakusalassa nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.2:5.1_2: Kusalo sahetuko dhammo nakusalassa nasahetukassa ca naakusalassa nasahetukassa ca
patthana16.2:6.1_0: Akusalo sahetuko dhammo naakusalassa nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.2:6.1_1: Akusalo sahetuko dhammo nakusalassa nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.2:6.1_2: Akusalo sahetuko dhammo nakusalassa nasahetukassa ca naakusalassa nasahetukassa ca
patthana16.2:7.1_0: Abyākato sahetuko dhammo nakusalassa nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.2:7.1_1: Abyākato sahetuko dhammo naakusalassa nasahetukassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana16.2:7.1_2: Abyākato sahetuko dhammo nakusalassa nasahetukassa ca naakusalassa nasahetukassa
patthana16.2:8.1_0: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe pannarasa, adhipatiyā nava, anantare samanantare sahajāte ekādasa,
patthana16.2:8.1_1: aññamaññe cha, nissaye ekādasa, upanissaye pannarasa, purejāte nava, āsevane tīṇi,
patthana16.2:8.1_2: kamme nava, vipāke tīṇi, āhāre indriye jhāne magge nava, sampayutte tīṇi, vippayutte
patthana16.2:9.1_0: Akusalaṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.2:9.1_1: Akusalaṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.2:9.1_2: Akusalaṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko ca naabyākato naahetuko ca dhammā
patthana16.2:10.1_0: Abyākataṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.2:10.1_1: Abyākataṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.2:10.1_2: Abyākataṁ ahetukaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko ca naakusalo naahetuko ca dhammā
patthana16.2:11.1: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha, vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
